CHAT.comment: FAT and Chi do not collaborate with each other while playing , but they are kind to each other and do assist the other player in his or her individual projects. Fat takes a while to warm to the activity and become an active participant. Chi does most of the talking. EXP is not central to the activity or conversation , but she is obviously present. Chi experiments with the magnets and notices that the metal objects only stick together when they are on the black base. Fat describes the basic concept behind magnets: that like forces repel , and unlike forces attract , and Fat demonstrates this for Chi. Audio tape could not be located; transcription and verification are from the video tape. Chi sits at a table with the magnets in front of her; Fat is not visible on the video; there are several objects piled on the black base and Chi holds the yellow wand over the base

u.a: Chi uses the yellow wand in an attempt to remove objects from the black base
an object on the black base which Chi is trying to remove using the wand
reaches hesitantly for the yellow wand and tries to remove an object from the base
opens the clear plastic box
removes two thin magnets , a square and a circle , from the plastic box and sets them on the table
picks up the round thin magnet and places it closer to him; he tries to pick it up with the wand , but the circle is repelled
while Chi removed other objects from the plastic box , a few washers fell next to the base and then quickly attached to it
Chi stacks washers on top of one another on their side .
FAT made the tower of washers fall by touching it with the yellow wand and then straigtened it out again by lifting the tower with the wand
the tower of washers fell when Fat pulled the wand away from the washers
holds washers in tower formation; wants Fat to use the wand to keep the tower standing
the tower fell slightly
FAT holds the wand over the tower of silver men , without touching it , as Chi steadies the tower
Chi removes hands; the tower remains steady with the help of the wands
briefly grabs hold of the yellow wand; the tower falls
tries to lift the tower back up , but it seems to have fallen apart too much
rebuilds part of the tower
the tower falls again .
shakes Fat's arm
sets one washer on its side on the base
places a second washer on top of the first
the two-washer tower falls
as Fat holds the wand over the tower of washers , the tower moves back and forth , away from the wand
using the wand , FAT straightened the tower
holds the wand over the circle and tries to make it move without touching it with the wand; the circle doesn't move
moves to place a silver stick in the hands of a silver man which stands atop the tower of washers
the tower of washers falls
looks for something in her hands and finds it
Chi holds the tower of washers steady and calls for Fat to use the wand to steady the tower instead
Chi moved the wand above the tower so that the wand was no longer touching it; the tower falls
tower
pulls washers off with some difficulty while holding the silver stick
Chi may have poked herself with the silver stick while she was pulling off the washers
removes stick from the base .
positions a washer on its side on the base .
the tower of washers fall
removes a nut from the base
positions a second washer on top of another
positions a third washer on top of the first two .
the tower leans over
repositions the tower so that it stands straight up
adds another washer to the stack

FAT holds the yellow wand steadily over the stack of washers; Chi places a silver man on top of the stack and the silver man , attracted to the yellow wand , jumps from the stack of washers to the wand
Chi adds another washer to the stack while Fat tries to reattach the silver man to the stack

g.ga: on top of the washer tower

u.a: takes the silver man from Fat and places it where Chi wants
several pieces at the top of the tower fall
whispered
Chi re-attaches a washer to the tower as Fat holds the wand above the tower; the newly attached washer is repelled by the wand and falls from the top position to attach to the side of the tower
the tower falls as Chi tries to reposition the top washer and straighten the tower
the tower
works on remaking the tower
the tower wobbles; Fat continues to hold the yellow wand above the tower
Chi moves the tower to a new area on the black base , more towards the center

g.ga: a certain place on the black base

u.a: sets up another washer near the base of the tower , apparently hoping to keep the tower steady

g.ga: with a washer leaned against the base

u.a: the tower falls
FAT
FAT and Chi hold the yellow wand over the thin , square , magnet; the magnet is repelled and moves away from the wand
Chi seems to want Fat to let go of the yellow wand
Chi lets go of the wand; Fat picks up the thin square magnet with the wand; Chi begins to rearrange objects on the base
a nut rolls onto the floor
picks up the nut and puts it back on the table
Chi plays with two nuts and a silver stick , but her hands are under the table for a few seconds; the cause of the whoops cannot be determined
Chi holds a silver stick , over which she has placed two nuts; Chi tries to attach a silver man to these objects , but none are magnetized; thus the silver man doesn't stick
steel also sounds like still pronounced with a southern accent
tries to remove a nut from the black base using the yellow wand; the nut will not move
lifts the nut indicated by Chi; another nut and a silver stick attach to the first nut as well; Fat holds all objects suspended briefly; then , they fall
holds the turtle and the orange man close together and moves them around on the red leg piece
a silver stick stands on the black base , balanced by the yellow wand which is held above the stick by Fat; as Fat moves the yellow wand , the stick moves as well
takes the wand from Fat
silver stick
places a nut on top of the silver stick and then removes the wand from above the structure; the stick and the nut remain standing

g.ga: silver stick with the nut on top

u.a: the stick with the nut on top of it falls when Chi moves the wand near the structure
removes the nut and tries to balance the purple star on the silver stick
the star and the stick fall when Chi lets go of them
holds the wand above the star with one hand , and holds the silver stick steady with the other hand; the purple star is attached to the top of the silver stick
the star falls when Chi removes the yellow wand
places a nut on top of the silver stick
moves the wand over the nut which is on top of the silver stick; the nut falls off the stick
places a nut on the wand and then sets it down onto the silver stick
the nut and the silver stick .
the nut and the silver stick fall when Chi stops steadying the structure with her hands
gets up from the table and goes into another room in the house
the paper clip sticks to the black base

g.ga: top of the silver stick and nut

u.a: FAT returns to the table
Chi adds another paper clip on top of the nut
moves the yellow wand over the top of the silver stick and nut tower; the two paper clips drop off the top
the entire tower falls
takes hold of the yellow wand which Chi laid on the table in order to reconstruct the tower .
moves Chi's hand away from the objects on the black base and holds the wand over the silver stick and nut tower which Chi remade
touches the tower with index finger; the tower falls
Chi puts objects on the base; Fat uses the yellow wand to move objects on the base
removes a silver man from the base with effort
silver man
sings
moves two silver men around on the base with her hands as if the two men are dancing
sings
sings
repositions the two silver men , which are now standing one on top of the other , in another space on the base
the two silver men fall
the two silver men which Chi has repositioned so that they again stand one on top of the other
works , with concentration , to add another silver man to the current tower of two silver men

g.ga: over the tower of silver men

u.a: the magnetic field of the wand helps to steady the tower of silver men
the tower falls
the silver men
FAT demonstrates repulsion with the yellow wand and the red ball which rests on the base

g.ga: between the ball and the wand

u.a: continues demonstrating for Chi
turns the wand around; the ball is attracted to the wand and attaches to it
turns the wand around to demonstrate repulsion
the tower of silver men falls as Chi tries to add a fifth silver man to the top
a silver man which Chi is attempting to remove from the base
silver men
begins rebuilding the silver men tower
FAT pulls at objects on the black base with the yellow wand , making the black base move
Chi has trouble stacking the silver men because Fat is moving the base
whispered .
silver men
whispered
moves to place the fifth silver man on top of the tower with intense concentration
the tower wobbles as Fat removes an object from the base; Chi backs away from placing the fifth silver man on top in order to steady the tower
the tower of silver men
places the fifth silver man on top of the tower; the tower remains steady and standing

g.ga: stacked all the silver man in a tower

u.a: grabs hold of several washers which are on the black base
the tower of silver men falls
a silver man rocks back and forth on the base
the tower of silver men which Chi was rebuilding falls
removes a silver man from the base with effort
silver men are arranged in a quasi-pyramid with one silver man on top
Chi demonstrates , by rubbing two washers together in her hands , that the washers will not stick together unless they are on the black base
takes the yellow wand from Fat
places the wand on top of the two washers
the two washers
when Chi placed the yellow wand on the washers , the silver man on top of the pyramid moved , and Chi is now referring to that
shrugs shoulders
the video stops and then restarts

the pyramid of silver men is on top of the black base , the wand rests on top of the pyramid and several objects are on top of the yellow wand; Chi is adding more objects onto the base , in the space below the wand
sits back in the chair and folds her arms across her chest as if she has just finished a masterpiece
adds a ball on top of the yellow wand

g.ga: pile of objects underneath the wand

u.a: removes the yellow wand from the top of the pile
nothing falls down
the pile of objects on the base falls
the video tape stops and then restarts
Chi is playing with objects on the black base; Fat moves a thin , square , magnet across the table using the repulsion between that magnet and the yellow wand
removes objects from the black base
continues removing objects from the base
FAT continues moving the thin square magnet using the yellow wand
places two silver sticks in upright positions on the base
video ends
